description: Sweet crispy tofu adds the perfect crunch and protein hit to this vegetarian stir fry.
name: Crispy Tofu Stir Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs maple syrup, peeled and sliced
2 large capsicums, green and red, diced

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, toss the cubed tofu with cornflour to coat. Heat 3 tablespoons of the oil in a large wok on a high heat and add the tofu. Fry for 2-3 minutes until golden and crisp on all sides. Remove from the pan with a slotted a spoon and drain on kitchen paper. Drizzle with maple syrup and set aside.

Add the remaining oil and cook the spring onions and capsicums for 3 minutes, then add the garlic, ginger and chilli and cook for 2 minutes. Add the mixed vegetables and cook for 1-2 minutes until softened.
Pour in the lime juice and soy sauce, toss to coat well and divide between 4 bowls. Top with the crispy tofu and serve.
